articles.title: Eavesdropping Bugs in MediaTek Chips Affect 37% of All Smartphones and IoT Globally - Internet
articles.description: Researchers have uncovered details of new vulnerabilities in MediaTek's audio DSP chips embedded in 37% of all smartphones and IoT devices.
articles.content: Multiple security weaknesses have been disclosed in MediaTek system-on-chips (SoCs) that could have enabled a threat actor to elevate privileges and execute arbitrary code in the firmware of the audi… [+2860 chars]
